Container.Name: ShareX Uploader
Container.Overview: Easily upload screenshots and files to a simple CDN using ShareX.

Config.Name: FILES_LOCATION
Config.Description: Where you want the uploaded files to be stored.

Config.Name: Max Upload Size
Config.Description: The max upload size of files in megabytes. Eg: 500M

Config.Name: Upload Secrets
Config.Description: You can add multiple secrets. Format: secret1,secret2,secret3

Config.Name: Upload Directory
Config.Description: The upload directory (If you don't know what this is, ignore it)

Config.Name: Use Random File Names
Config.Description: Use random file names instead of the original file name. (If this is enabled it will replace the file name given by ShareX with a random one)

Config.Name: Random File Name Length
Config.Description: The length of the random file name (if above setting is enabled)

Config.Name: Server Port
Config.Description: The port to connect to the application on.
